original_title: 潜入捜査官～妖しき罠（トラップ）～
overview: An undercover investigator who wears an enamel suit and looks into the bust from the chest to catch the man's eyes. A mysterious trap was waiting for her to infiltrate. She sacrifices herself and is involved in the plot of an evil organization, but desperately confronts her to resolve the case.
title: Konno Anna – Undercover Investigator
